name: Wing Kitties
description:
Kitties in Jets!

How to play:

For best results, Direct IP Hosting and joining is recommended!

To play multiplayer players must connect through Hamachi(Or any VPN), but single player (While kitty is lonely) is possible through just hosting!

Gamepad  Recommended!
Thrust = Right Trigger/Left Shift

Left/Right movement(Yaw) = Left/Right bumpers or Q/E

Left/Right Roll = Left Joystick Left/Right or A/D

Pitch = Left Joystick Up/Down(Inverted) or W/S

Created with love by:

  • @ZuwelArcana
  • @JackietkFrost
